extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Inflation Theory in big bang theory and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have an emphasis on exponential expansion
extended_metaphor.inflation_theory: In Inflation Theory, the proposed initial phase of exponential expansion is driven by a mysterious energy source that rapidly expanded and smoothed out the universe's geometry.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: Similarly, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man functions by generating and harnessing energy exponentially to power the suit, mirroring the rapid expansion and energy generation seen in Inflation Theory.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Inflation Theory in big bang theory and Arc Reactor in Iron Man are focused on ensuring a more uniform and flat spacetime
extended_metaphor.inflation_theory: Inflation Theory ensures a more uniform and flat spacetime by a mechanism grounded in fundamental principles of physics, resulting in the consistent structure of the universe.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: Likewise, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man ensures a balanced power distribution throughout the suit, creating a more uniform and efficient energy flow that enhances the functionality of the suit, drawing a parallel to the uniformity and efficiency achieved by Inflation Theory.
